class.name: JSONParseResult
class.brief_description: Data class wrapper for decoded JSON.
class.description: Returned by [method JSON.parse], [JSONParseResult] contains the decoded JSON or error information if the JSON source wasn't successfully parsed. You can check if the JSON source was successfully parsed with [code]if json_result.error == OK[/code].

members.member: The error type if the JSON source was not successfully parsed. See the [enum Error] constants.
The line number where the error occurred if the JSON source was not successfully parsed.
The error message if the JSON source was not successfully parsed. See the [enum Error] constants.
